detectors.description: Variable Milkyway._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#34) is not in mixedCase

	- _totalSupply = 21000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#44)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#5)
	- Milkyway.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#50-52)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#6)
	- Milkyway.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#54-56)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#7)
	- Milkyway.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#58-60)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#8)
	- Milkyway.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#68-75)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#9)
	- Milkyway.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#62-66)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#23)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Milkyway.sol#23-25)
